name: South London simulator 2022
description:
The worlds first, most authentic, most realistic simulation of South Londoner life.

Immerse yourself in the vibrant world of South London and allow yourself to experience the daily life of an average South Londoner, Winston, as he goes about running his various "errands".

__________________________________________________________

FEATURES:

  • Realistic vehicle physics
  • Stunning visuals
  • RTX integration
  • Over 5000 directly supported resolutions
  • Groundbreaking NPC ai
  • DLSS and VSYNC
  • Immersive, heartwarming story

__________________________________________________________

This game is still under active development, and some of the above discussed features are still yet to be built, and will be added at some point in the following days
